result.markdown: --- title: "Week 8: Object-oriented programming" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## Main reference * [13 *Advanced R*](https://adv-r.hadley.nz/s3.html) ## What you will learn this week Overview of object-oriented programming in R, focusing on S3. ## Slides for week Download pdf ## Assignments * [Assignment 3](../assignments/A3.qmd) is due on Friday 02 May. ## Online resources * [A simple guide to S3 methods](https://www.njtierney.com/post/2016/11/06/simple-s3-post/) * [S4: a short guide for the perplexed](https://stuartlee.org/2019/07/09/s4-short-guide/) * [Comparing S3 and S4 on an example](https://faculty.washington.edu/kenrice/sisg-adv/sisg17-pack-03.pdf) * [S4](https://kasperdanielhansen.github.io/genbioconductor/html/R_S4.html) * [R6](https://r6.r-lib.org/) * [S7](https://rconsortium.github.io/S7/)
